name: livox
description: Transforme seus documentos e e-books em audiobooks com vozes naturais e de alta qualidade usando tecnologia de ponta.

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.electron:build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:build && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:pack: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:build && npx electron-packager . LiVox --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist-packager --overwrite --icon=icon.ico

author: LiVox Team
